document.full_text: a woman killed during the raid of osama bin laden's compound in pakistan was not his wife and was not used as a human shield by the al qaeda leader before his death, a u.s. official said on monday, correcting an earlier description.
document.title: bin laden's wife not killed in raid, white house says
lines_and_colors: a woman killed during the raid of osama bin laden's compound in pakistan was not his wife and was not used as a human shield by the al qaeda leader before his death, a u.s. official said on monday, correcting an earlier description.
